headline: Services for Data Center Markets, 2030 by Design & Engineering, FM, Commissioning & Testing, IT Infrastructure Management, Decommissioning & Relocation, Specialized Consulting and Certification
summary: The data center services market is set to expand significantly, with its valuation expected to soar from USD 115.94 billion in 2025 to USD 320.89 billion by 2030, exhibiting a CAGR of 22.6%. Growth is fueled by demand for digital infrastructure, cloud computing, AI, and high-performance workloads. The market spans colocation, managed hosting, cloud solutions, and more, prioritizing operational efficiency and sustainability. Commissioning and testing services are forecasted to witness the fastest
